overall_assessment.description: A summary assessment or evaluation of the subject.

questions_answered_correctly.description: The number of questions answered correctly.

strengths.description: A list of strengths or positive attributes.

weaknesses.description: A list of weaknesses or areas for improvement.

actionable_feedback.description: Feedback that can be acted upon, categorized into different areas.

business_case_impact_analysis.description: Analysis of the impact on the business case, categorized into different areas.
